subNode:value.scalar:string: SELECT p.id_product, pl.id_lang, pl.id_shop, pl.name pname, p.reference, p.ean13, p.upc, pl.description_short, pl.description, cl.name cname, m.name mname, l.iso_code FROM
category_lang cl ON (cl.id_category = product_shop.id_category_default AND pl.id_lang = cl.id_lang AND cl.id_shop = product_shop.id_shop) LEFT JOIN
manufacturer m ON m.id_manufacturer = p.id_manufacturer LEFT JOIN
lang l ON l.id_lang = pl.id_lang WHERE product_shop.indexed = 0 AND product_shop.visibility IN ("both", "search")

scalar:array.comment: // Retrieve the number of languages
// Retrieve the number of languages
// Products are processed 50 by 50 in order to avoid overloading MySQL
// Now each non-indexed product is processed one by one, langage by langage
// Data must be cleaned of html, bad characters, spaces and anything, then if the resulting words are long enough, they're added to the array
// Data must be cleaned of html, bad characters, spaces and anything, then if the resulting words are long enough, they're added to the array
// Remove accents
// Remove accents
// If we find words that need to be indexed, they're added to the word table in the database
// The words are inserted...
// The words are inserted...
// ...then their IDs are retrieved and added to the cache
// ...then their IDs are retrieved and added to the cache
// replace accents from the retrieved words so that words without accents or with differents accents can still be linked
// Force save every 200 words in order to avoid overloading MySQL
// One last save is done at the end in order to save what's left
// One last save is done at the end in order to save what's left
/** $queryArray3 is automatically emptied in order to be reused immediatly */
